item.title: D365 business events error
item.description: Problem Starting February 2020 a strange thing happened on our D365: all business events connected to Microsoft Flow suddenly stopped working. Under the errors tab in business events workspace, it shows this exception: The underlying connection was closed: An unexpected error occurred on a send. Doing some research hasn’t helped much - all I got is this exception message is somehow related to security protocols and TLS 1.2. Turns out this error occurs only if you are using .
